info.title: easy-to-give-then-receive SDG OpenAPI Specification.
info.description: OpenAPI specification used to build a custom watsonx Assistant extension to integrate with the UNSD SDG API and explore the official SDG data reported by the custodian agencies.

post.summary: Returns the list of all applicable disaggregated series dimensions.
Returns the list of all applicable disaggregated series dimensions.
Returns list of compare trends values for given one series and geoareas.

methodologyType.description: Methodology For timeSeries(1-Original Data,2-Normalized Data 2015,3-Normalized Data 2010,4-Growth Rate)

post.summary: Returns list of compare trends values for given multi series and geoarea.

post.summary: Returns list of Compare indicators across all goals for given geoareas

dataPointType.description: Data points for country (int) e.g 1 -Data for atleast 1 year since 2015,2-Data for atleast 2 years since 2015,3-Data for at least two years since 2015 and at least two years before 2015

countryId.description: country code (int) e.g 0 for all countries

natureOfData.description: Nature of data (string) e.g {'All':All,'C':Country Data,'CNA':Country data and adjusted country data}

natureOfData.description: Nature of data (string) e.g {'All':All,'C':Country Data,'CNA':Country data and adjusted country data}

natureOfData.description: Nature of data (string) e.g {'All':All,'C':Country Data,'CNA':Country data and adjusted country data}

disaggregationType.description: Disaggregation type (int). e.g 0 : Any type of disaggregation.

get.summary: Returns list of countries, ISO and M49 Codes.
Returns a flat list with all the geographies; geoAreaCode is the M49 Code
get.description: Returns a flat list with all the geographies; geoAreaCode is the M49 Code

get.summary: Returns a tree of regions and countries.
get.description: Returns a flat list with all the geographies with hierarchy

get.description: Returns the list of Series avialable for that geoArea

post.description: Return a count of data points available

get.summary: Returns the list of all Goals available.
get.description: Returns the list of all Goals currently published in the latest release, you can include all the Targets, Indicator and series description using includechildren

parameters.name: includechildren
parameters.description: Includes information for Target, Series and indicators

get.summary: Returns the list of all Targets available for a Goal.
get.description: Returns the list of all Targets for an specific Goal currently published in the latest release, you can include all the Targets, Indicator and series description using includechildren

parameters.name: includechildren
parameters.description: Includes information for Target, Series and indicators

parameters.name: goalCode
parameters.description: Code of the goal that we are querying

get.summary: Returns a list of geographies that have values on that Goal
get.description: Given a goal code will return a list of M49 code - Name of countries that have observations for that series

get.summary: Returns a list of dimensions for a series
get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return a list of dimensions for that series code

get.summary: Returns a list of attributes for a series
get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return a list of dimensions for that series code

get.summary: Returns a list of paginated observations
get.description: Returns a list of obeservations filetered by the parameters defined on the call

parameters.name: goal
parameters.description: List of codes for the Goals we are queying

parameters.name: timePeriod
parameters.description: List of years from which we want data eg: ["2000","2010"]

get.description: Returns the list of all Indicators currently published in the latest release. The informaton includes series information and Goal - Target hierarchy

get.summary: Returns the list of all series for an indincator code
get.description: Returns the list of all series for an indincator code, currently published in the latest release

parameters.name: indicatorCode
parameters.description: Code of the indicator that we are querying

get.summary: Returns the list of all Series available
get.description: Returns the list of all Series currently published in the latest release, you can use the allreleases flag to include archived data

get.summary: Returns the series information
get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return the attributes related to that series. Including Goal, Target and Indicators to which the series are leated.

get.summary: Returns a list of geographies that have values on that series
get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return a list of M49 code - Name of countries that have observations for that series

get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return a list of dimensions for that series code

get.summary: Returns a list of attributes for a series
get.description: Given a series SDMX code will return a list of attributes for that series code

post.summary: Returns a list of TimePeriods for a list of series and regions
post.description: Given a series SDMX codes and areaCodes will return a list of years available for that data

post.summary: Returns a Cound of data points available for a list of series and regions
post.description: Given a series SDMX codes and areaCodes will return a list of years available for that data

areaCodes.description: Code for a group of regions

post.summary: Returns a count of data points for series and areacodes
post.description: Given a series SDMX codes and areaCodes will return a count of data points available for that data

areaCodes.description: Code for a group of regions
